ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Druid flying solo, mostly.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lower teens yes, you can still get exp here in the higher teens too but a lot of stuff is starting to turn green.  One of the better places for druid solo post
ygData.messageBody:
Lower teens yes, you can still get exp here in the higher teens too but a
lot of stuff is starting to turn green. One of the better places for druid
solo post 24 is Unrest. Use wolf form and harmony to single pull and there
is tons to pull there if not on peak hours. At least on my server.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: MLockridge01@... [mailto:MLockridge01@...]
Sent: Friday, May 18, 2001 8:20 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Druid flying solo, mostly.


Lavastorm is good for teen solo?

I'll check it out.

Barto
